ISSUE.TITLE: MySqlException in catalog view
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: latest Steps to reproduce the problem: install nopCommerce 4.4 beta using MySQL server (docker image: 8.0.21-1debian10), creating sample data. Wait for installation to complete and restart. Navigate to any product category. The following error is shown: MySqlException: Expression #1 of ORDER BY clause is not in SELECT list, references column 'nop44.sa.DisplayOrder' which is not in SELECT list; this is incompatible with DISTINCT (full error message in attachment) [Internal Server Error.pdf](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/files/6030400/Internal.Server.Error.pdf)
